attributes.action: Immediate lifting of visa requirements between Ukraine and United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
UK has to stand in solidarity with Ukraine and its people and will play part in assisting them in their time of need.
In order to condemn Russian invasion of Ukraine, and the unjustified and unprovoked attack against a democratic sovereign state in Europe, Ukrainians have a right to go to the UK because of the threat to be killed by Russian troops.
attributes.background:
This will streamline and support the swift exit of the family members of people from Ukraine who are resident in the United Kingdom.
It will apply as an emergency measure to all Ukrainians traveling to United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
